A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Mary Poppins Leia\, barely 3 days of training Rey can take out Jedi Master Luke Skywalker in a lightsabre fight\, purple hair Laura Dern withholding information from her crew so they mutiny on her\, the list goes on.  I'm not even a die hard Star Wars fan\, this was just horrible.  Not going to bother watching the next one.  They aren't getting any more of my money.
